attributes.review: NO ONE GET THIS APP. I KNEW IT WAS WEIRD WHEN I OPENED THE APP AND ASKED FOR MY LOCATION AND OTHER INFO IN ORDER TO TRACK ME. BUT THEN, IT GOT EVEN WEIRDER. SHE IS TOO INNOCENT FOR THIS. KANYE WEST 2020
